tool_description: Calculates service level agreement targets and deadlines based on priority, customer tier, and business rules.

priority.description: Ticket priority level (P1, P2, P3, P4)

error_messages: Invalid priority: Use one of [P1, P2, P3, P4].
Invalid customer tier: Use one of [bronze, silver, gold, platinum].
Invalid timestamp: Provide a valid ISO 8601 datetime string.
Future timestamp: Created timestamp cannot be in the future.
SLA rules not found: No SLA rules defined for this priority/tier combination.
usage: Provide ticket details to calculate appropriate SLA targets including first response time, resolution time, and escalation thresholds.

escalation_threshold.description: When to escalate if not progressing

business_hours_only.description: Whether SLA counts only business hours

sla_buffer_minutes.description: Buffer time before SLA breach warnings
